item.title: bp004 – Evil Japanese Money Laundering
item.description: In this episode we talk about summer activities, money laundering, alpha bets and communication tools. And pizza.
item.dc:creator: booncon
item.itunes:title: bp004 – Evil Japanese Money Laundering
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer activities and pizza
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we talk about summer activities, money laundering, alpha bets and communication tools. And pizza.
item.itunes:author: booncon
item.googleplay:description: In this episode we talk about summer activities, money laundering, alpha bets and communication tools. And pizza.
item.content:encoded:
Intro

@saftsaak – @metzelfetz

Frustrating banks & evil money laundering

Finnish Trade Register – Finnish banks – Money laundering – Translation of official documents – Finnish signature service – KPMG

Terrible war on Facebook

Finland taking a right turn – Immonen Facebook post – Diversity rally – Picking Finland #1 – Picking Finland #2 – The Finns ideology seminars – Luki’s blog post on the topic

All hail to the mountain king

XLETIX Challenge Tyrol – Obstacle Racing – Spot Tobi doing his move – Team building

Luki pronouncing Japanese words

Tenkara – Tenkara rods – Tenkara techniques – Simple is great

Placing bets on alpha jokes

Google is it’s own father – G is for Google – Explaining technicalities – Stock market strategy – EU Antitrust case – Loyal talent – @alphabet Tweet – BMW pun

Communicating empty promises

Internal communication

Emails' 2nd base

Basecamp

Slacking while channeling the hashtag

Slack – channels, not hashtags – Integrations – Github – Zendesk

Much more structured discourses

Discourse – Knowledge Sharing – Forum – Wiki – Why it’s great – Discourse plans – Set up Discourse on Digital Ocean

One last thing to eat

Restaurant day – Buddies' Pizza Bistro

Outro

booncon.com/podcast – @booncon

item.content:encoded:
Intro

@saftsaak – @metzelfetz

Nordic Startup Environment

Startup Sauna – #cphftw – Helsinki Gaming Scene – Catchbox – LeeLuu

AWSome Day Helsinki

AWS – Roadshow 2015 – Redshift – AWS Summit Stockholm 2015

A little bit of sports

Toughest – Disc Golf – Portable disc golf basket

Lazer eyes

PRK – SMILE – Eye Exam Equipment

TV show recommendations

Gotham – Black Mirror

Rant of the week: Google Chromebox for meetings

Chromebox for meetings

Outro

booncon.com/podcast – @booncon

item.content:encoded:
Intro

@saftsaak – @metzelfetz

A lot of random topics

work stuff – experiences – more experiences

Our background

booncon – South Tirol

Snucking out in Italy

work tools: Trello, Basecamp – pizza place of choice

Tobi gets trolled by a Brit

Facebook – Trolling – European Union – Euro

Luki doesn't have a life

crazy hours

This weeks podcast recommendation

Stuff You Should Know – How Ice Cream Works – How Feng Shui Works – bedroom mirrors

Plans for the future

Helsinki Startup Scene: Aaltoes, Slush, Startup Sauna, ArcticStartup – Work methods

Outro

booncon.com/podcast – @booncon

item.content:encoded:
Surprise Surprise

@saftsaak – @metzelfetz

Klask/ Klūsk

Klask rules – Buy Klask

Rules to the dumbest card game ever

Apparently the game is actually called "Around the world" – Solidarity

Akwardy walk-iny

grex musicus

Serious presentation avoidance

cat gifs

A philosophy we want to bring into the world

booncon – more about booncon – even more about booncon

Offspring reluctance

booncon PIXELS – how we work – PIXELS Team: 9 nationalities, 15 languages

Offspring promiscuity

Tiny Tin Box

Something more

Project X

Luki of Finland

HS article (FIN) – article translation

Fidel Castro 2.0

Castro

Unconditional bye bye

booncon.com/podcast – @booncon

item.title: bp003 – Travellers
item.description: In this episode we reminisce about our recent trips around Europe, the events we visited and our experiences in tech, business and podcasting.
item.dc:creator: booncon
item.itunes:title: bp003 – Travellers
item.itunes:subtitle: Reminiscing about our recent trips around Europe
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we reminisce about our recent trips around Europe, the events we visited and our experiences in tech, business and podcasting.
item.itunes:author: booncon
item.googleplay:description: In this episode we reminisce about our recent trips around Europe, the events we visited and our experiences in tech, business and podcasting.
item.content:encoded:
Intro

@saftsaak – @metzelfetz

Tobi gets trolled in a good way by the doctor

Starship Troopers – MRI not MRT – SMILE – Astigmatism – Silmäasema – Hyperopia – "Grey star" -> Cataract

AWS Summit Stockholm: Age of Ultron

AWS Summit Stockholm 2015 – Tictail – Avengers: Age of Ultron – Amazon S3 – Amazon EFS

Haggling and bullying in Italy, Sweden and Poland

Torggler – Nordic Business Culture – Haggling – Partitions of Poland – Polish grammar – Languages and skills – Language philosophy

Podlove and the high noble art of podcasting

#ppw15a – Sendegate – Podlove Publisher – Podcasting vs YouTube – German Podcasting – Shownotes – Podlove Webplayer – Podcatchers: Castro, Pocket Casts, Instacast

Sniffing garbage bins, Kellogg's and phone numbers at the re:publica

re:publica – #rp15 – Aral Balkan – @aral – Metadata tracking – Mikko Hypponen – @mikko – Value of personal data – Snooping Garbage Bins

The dancing Mickey Mouse on Apple's little helper

Apple Watch – re:publica app – WAP pages – Social effects of smart watches

HBD EU and why expats aren't immigrants

EU Birthday – UK election – EU needs Britain – EU Mediterranean – Mediterranean refugee streams – Finnish election – Expats vs immigrants – EUobserver

Outro

booncon.com/podcast – @booncon

item.title: bp005 – Drawing a Picture
item.description: This time we cry about the EU crisis, budgeting of Texas trips, escaping the Zika virus and strap-on spikes (if you know what we mean).
item.dc:creator: booncon
item.itunes:title: bp005 – Drawing a Picture
item.itunes:subtitle: Crying about the EU crisis
item.itunes:summary: This time we cry about the EU crisis, budgeting of Texas trips, escaping the Zika virus and strap-on spikes (if you know what we mean).
item.itunes:author: booncon
item.googleplay:description: This time we cry about the EU crisis, budgeting of Texas trips, escaping the Zika virus and strap-on spikes (if you know what we mean).
item.content:encoded:
Intro

@saftsaak – @metzelfetz

Apologetic promises

Sorry – Optimism

State of the Union

Toilet revelation – Positive news – Euro crisis – Refugee crisis – Terrorist attacks – Brexit – Ukraine war – Rise of populists: Front National, UKIP, FPÖ, Fidesz, PiS – Death Star – EU institutions – EU vs Member States – European new sources: euobserver, Politico EU, European Public Affairs

Worktopics

Budgeting and time tracking with Harvest – Scheduling with Forecast – Lists of to do cards with Trello

The Golden Bridge to overseas

WooCommerce for Wordpress – WooConf 2016 – Online store example – Texas – WooConf 2016 discount code: WOOCONFBOONCON – WordCamp Finland 2016

Zika is in the air

Zika virus – Zika epidemic – Guillain–Barré Syndrom – Myelitis – Encephalitis – Microcephaly – BBC The Inquiry: Why Don’t We Eradicate Mosquitoes? – Tiger mosquito

When it's cold outside

[Beach volleyball](http://www.biitsi.fi/) – [Escape room Exite](http://www.exite.fi/en/) – [Lazer-haunted-house-themed-minigolf](http://www.hohtogolf.fi/helsinki/) – [Disc golf](https://www.wikiwand.com/de/Discgolf) – [Strap-on spikes](http://www.amazon.com/Yaktrax-Pro-Traction-Cleats-Snow/dp/B001CZJBKC)

Outro

booncon.com/podcast – @booncon

item.content:encoded:
Intro

@saftsaak – @metzelfetz

Finnish train operators

VR – also VR

A new, better world

Playstation VR – Battlezone

How to anchor sea-sickness

Cybersickness

The uncomfortable Rift to VR scars

Oculus – Diver's mask

\$

Keep talking and nobody explodes – Here they lie – VR Worlds – Mad Max

A field with lions vs. alone in a museum with dinosaurs

Star Trek: Bridge Crew – Introduction to Virtual Reality

Expensive Tân line

Tân line – BBC Worldservice, The Inquiry "How will Virtual Reality Change our Lives?" – Zombies, run! – Allumette

Research needed

Japanese decline of sexual activity

Help

booncon.com/podcast – @booncon
